commit message: Move limiters to their own layer
Defer to TabHost to retrieve MediaAdapters
Update the filter for all lists
Long press back finish activity and disconnects from service
Share connect service code
Don't autoconnect to service if it was explicity stopped within the application
Spin the notification off into its own class

Combine stateChanged and songChanged events

In addition, move some of this event handling code into the
PlaybackServiceActivity superclass
Make limiters work again
Split Song into Song and SongData
Remove dead file
Set right expander listener
Avoid referencing issue
Ignore case in comparisons
Convert MediaView into a single view
Listen for song change in AppWidgetProvider
Split service state handling code into discrete class
Don't crash when the service is already disconnected and update state to allow reconnection
Initialize the widget even when the service is dead
Update widget play/pause icon according to state
Relocate scrobbling code
Make updateState thread-safe

Enable seeking while paused

I am not too sure why I had this disabled to begin with

Set a foreground image instead of background image in the widget

This has proper scaling and can be set in RemoteViews. Curiously, it requires
that the transparent placeholder be the same size as the icon---the image size
doesn't seem to be updated when the drawable state changes
Replace the stop service function with an exit function
Integrate MediaView into MediaAdapter
Remove unneeded use of SongData.Field
Add an expand menu action
Don't hide MediaViews when we are not going to reshow them
Remove SongData.Field
Update the notification on initial load
Allow the widget to start the playback service
Set state to paused on service destruction

Make SongSelector a dialog

This prevents the NowPlayingActivity from being stopped, so the covers will
update in the background when a song is selected in the song selector.
Move quit to ContextApplication

Just look for the handler on startup instead of a custom variable

We depend on mHandler to begin with, so the variable could cause trouble

Don't worry about unsetting the service in unbindService

This isn't necessary now that this only occurs when the activity finishes

Defer some service startup code

The main advantage to this is the notification will now be executed after any
pending go messages are sent; there won't be a sudden change in the notification
when a play message is sent on startup

Rename the main activities to be more consitent

NowPlayingActivity -> FullPlaybackActivity
RemoteActivity -> MiniPlaybackActivity

Also renamed referenced layouts and move the MiniPlaybackActivity layout inside
the main activity file

Fix some crashers that show up with no media

Because I never seem to test this code path :)

Simplify the way the message overlay works

Take advantage of addContentView and just leave the view around when done with
it; it's not too heavy

Move common setService code into PlaybackActivity

This removes the condition where the mini activity finishes when the service is
set to null. I'm not aware of any time this actually occurs, anyway...
Don't clear covers on stop

Increase the double-tap time for the widget

This really just needs to be a long press... but I don't think there is any way
to accomplish this inside a RemoteView

Update the notification properly when the song changes

Clearly I don't look at the notification very often :)

Cancel the notification through updateState on service destruction

The avoids a flicker to the paused notification if destroyed while playing
Only display the icon as the cover in the widget when loading from state
Add icons to the menu, change the order and rename 'media library' to 'choose songs'

Fix the SongSelector background on Android 1.5

Android 1.5 takes a black background to be translucent for some reason

Double tap inside song selector dismisses it

This doesn't work as well as I would like due to the way Android handles
focusing clicks.. but it's something

Make the service state a set of flags

I like flags
Change togglePlayback to toggleFlag
Handle null intents in onStart
Flip around the choose songs check

Open the playback activity any time the last played item is pressed

Not just within half a second
Handle the context menu in song selector properly

setCurrentSong on startup

Uhhh where did it go?
Change event_loaded to replace_song
Return updateState to old behavior
Lazy load mActivities in ContextApplication
Keep Random instance in ContextApplication
Simplify state loading code
Move song randomization into Song

Remove oldState in the changed broadcast

It is not really all that useful
Allow the notification to never be shown
Remove debug output

Convert default action preference to use integer strings

Might as well break some more preferences while we're at it

Load dialog code in onCreate

Historical cruft allowed this to creep into the constructor

Load preferences in onStart in song selector

So the app doesn't need to be restarted to reload these preferences
Make double tap song selector dismissal activate for any action

Retrieve a random song by selecting a random row from a query of all songs

This means we don't have to keep a long array of song ids around. Speed change is not significant

Covert ids from int to long

MediaStore keeps ids as longs. It is unlikely that someone will have more than 65k songs... but you never know

Rework MediaAdapter to be backed by a Cursor instead of an array

This reduces memory requirements and amount of code

Remove the dialer input preference

It is not hooked up to anything anymore since supporting it with an SQl query
would be complicated.
Reset the last acted id when the song selector is opened

Subclass MediaAdapter for songs

Override the sort order when limiting by album to sort by track number

Make the expander flag in MediaAdapter a boolean

Historical reasons had it as a reference. This reference is not necessary now

Limit the view being expanded to synchronously

The old array adapter prevented a flicker from many songs being displayed to just a few songs being dispalyed after expanding an item. This restores that behavior.

Update the cover view when the queue changes

This became necessary after the coversion of song selector to a dialog, but was
never added
Organize translatable strings
Reword the mini player preference
Add preference to open song selector on startup
Further organize strings
Update the readme
Set a title in the song selector context menu

Make sure we are actually starting up in onCreate

Not just changing configurations

Allow the song info to be shown below the cover instead of on top of it

The complexity of the cover view drawing routines is getting a bit ridiculous..
Add vertical padding to the seek bar
Combine code to handle playback control buttons

Set the no media flag in setCurrentSong rather than in getSong

Avoids an infinite loop on startup with no media
Don't disable the library menu entry when there are no songs

Reorganize PlaybackService

The old organization reflected a mystical thread barrier that does not really
exist. The new organization is more typical of the other classes

Handle loss of media gracefully

When the sd card is unmounted, the song will immediately stop and the no media
message will appear. The message will now automatically go away when media is
available

Implement similar graceful no media handling in song selector

Songs disappear when the sd card is unmounted and reappear when it is remounted
Defer creation of a few utility classes in PlaybackService

Improve the initial state handling

Now actually notices when the state is uninitialized and updates the state
properly

Add a volume setting

This provides a complement to the system media volume, providing more
fine-grained control

Add a null pointer check for mMediaPlayer

It can happen...
Added headset button handling
Make MediaButtonReceiver follow code style and remove long press for now

Preload the media button receiver

It has a somewhat noticable initialization delay
Make the double click functionality of the media control actions optional

Add a previous song action

This is completely untested :)
Add a preference for the headset button
Automatically play when using the headset control advance

Handle the media buttons inside the service

It seems to be faster and cheaper to do this. External receiver is still
necessary to fire up the service however.
Create the Handler in PlaybackService as soon as possible

Update OneCellWidget intent receiver

newState -> state

Simplify initial cover art load

We now load the state in Service onCreate so that the first song will always
be ready when CoverView is initialized. This makes the code somewhat simpler.

Don't break the back button

It's bad news
Disable the media button controls when in a call
Save the display mode pref immediately after it changes

Optimize CoverView

Minimize floating point operations and memory allocations. Remove some redundant
code.

Optimize MediaAdapter.MediaView

Remove floating-point math and eliminate the need for implicit accessor methods.
Move broadcastSongChange into updateState
Reuse Paint in MediaView
Store icons as raw bitmaps in CoverView

Add a separator between the expander and the title in MediaView

Some people don't seem to grok that it is a second place to press. Maybe this
will make it more obvious?
Draw the gradient line for the list dividers too

Change the separator line from a gradient-colored to dashed

Meshes better with the divider gradient, methinks

Don't crash when pressing the expander area when there are no expanders

It's bad

Move DO_ITEM into its own method
Combine getAllSongIds and getAllSongsIdsWith
Add ids to array in order in getAllSongIdsWith

Share menu code between FullPlaybackActivity and SongSelector

This allows SongSelector to have a shuffle menu item
Repeat option
Save song flags in state

Keep track of the timeline pos in CoverView

This way we don't cause funkiness when we store covers due to repeat that don't

Make some private members in PlaybackService package-protected

Don't subclass Handler where possible
Rename mCurrentSong to mTimelinePos
Remove the need for accessors in SongSelector

Reset the queue position when the song selector opens

This is what the old behavior did

Update prefs in SongSelector in all cases

Including when we return from the prefs activity

Center the expander in its cut-out

It seems to look a little nicer
Add more file types to .gitignore
Enabling shuffle shuffles repeated songs
Store mRepeatStart as a position rather than a pointer
Update the previous cover when repeating
Don't remove the repeat start song
Save repeat and shuffle states

Reorder the menu

Keeps things more consistent

Add controls in the song selector

This is somewhat hackish.
Sort a little better for chosen songs
Sort a little better for SongMediaAdapter songs
Fix crasher
Remove some unused imports

Use an alternative method to fetch cover art

This seems to allow the MediaStore to generate the thumbnails for cover art if
they do not exist yet.

Is this documented anywhere..?
Don't dismiss the dialog on back press in selector-on-startup mode
Search button toggles song selector on/off

Swap library / display mode menu items

Cpoy the albumId into the parcel
Fix CoverView rendering in horizontal separated mode

Don't automatically hide the controls in the main view

Let's just try it out. It's more like the iPod/iPhone..?
Use the private MediaScanner API to load cover art

Remove reliance on MediaStore cover cache

Cover art retrieval now relies completely on undocumented APIs, but it _is_ a
little faster

Remove the double-press-launches-activity functionality in the widget

This feature causes a delay after pressing either of the buttons and is not

Use the application icon as the widget fallback background in all cases

Move all of the media button handling code into PlaybackService

Also disable MediaButtonReceiver when it is not needed
Make the external output only preference work again
Make SongSelector an Activity again
Don't use binders or broadcasts to communicate within the application
Move bitmap generation and service interaction into a background thread

Document most of Song
Document ContextApplication

Don't prevent flinging in CoverView either
Split bitmap generation code out of CoverView

Store generated cover art views in a cache in CoverView
